movie_title: ENGLISH SPEECH | ELIZABETH OLSEN: The Latitude Project (English Subtitles)
introduction: Learn English with Elizabeth Olsen. Elizabeth Olsen was honored with the EMA Futures Award for her l

vocabulary.definition: a person who speaks on behalf of a group or organization
vocabulary.example: Elizabeth Olsen is the beloved spokesperson for the Latitude Project.

vocabulary.definition: too large, extensive, or extreme to measure
vocabulary.example: The impact of their work on the community is immeasurable.

vocabulary.definition: a policy of extending a country's power and influence through diplomacy or military force
vocabulary.example: The Latitude Project does not engage in imperialism but works as partners with communities.

vocabulary.definition: the action of giving someone support, confidence, or hope
vocabulary.example: The gratitude from the communities has been a great source of encouragement for the sisters.

vocabulary.definition: able to be maintained at a certain rate or level
vocabulary.example: The Latitude Project focuses on building not just physical structures but also hope and pride for sustainable development.

vocabulary.definition: to show or prove to be right or reasonable
vocabulary.example: Elizabeth Olsen promised to justify the honor bestowed upon her by continuing her impactful work.
